data.title: Horse Soldier Bourbon investing in Somerset with planned distillery
data.meta_description: The distillery plans to open on America's 250th birthday, July 4, 2026.
data.text:

Somerset, Kentucky, in Pulaski County, will be the home of a distillery for Horse Soldier Bourbon.
